model_info.description: Llama 3.3 70B Instruct Turbo Free is a free-tier multilingual large language model developed by Meta and hosted on Together AI. It features 70 billion parameters, a 131,072-token context length, and is optimized for dialogue-based tasks. The model supports comprehensive multilingual capabilities and outperforms many chat models in benchmarks, making it ideal for testing, development, and small-scale applications.
strengths: 70 billion parameters for advanced reasoning and dialogue capabilities
131,072-token context window for handling long inputs
Optimized for multilingual conversational use cases
Free tier access with no initial cost for development/testing
Outperforms many open-source and closed chat models in benchmarks
limitations: Free tier rate limits (0.3-60 requests per minute)
No support for function/tool calling on free tier
Limited concurrent request handling and lower priority than paid tiers
Not suitable for production or high-volume applications
